casebody.data:
No. 10-687. Mark Albrecht, et ux., Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated, Petitioners v. Brian Treon, Individually and in His Official Capacity as Coroner of Clermont County, Ohio, and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated, et al. 562 U.S. 1201, 131 S. Ct. 1047,

178 L. Ed. 2d 866,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 957. January 24, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 617 F.3d 890.
